title: Science-Based Companion Planting Strategies for Greater Yield You Need to Use NOW
itunes:title: Science-Based Companion Planting Strategies for Greater Yield You Need to Use NOW
description: Did you know you could add nitrogen and feed the soil by using specific companion plants? Today's episode shares which companion plants can ADD nitrogen to the soil, when to plant them, and what you need to do in order to do it successfully (and avoid having crops take over) all with no-till methods. For more information and shownotes visit melissaknorris.com/299.
